title: Honour system bug?
body:
I think I'm bugged and can't level up to honour level 3. I never get reported, I play a lot of games, I get honored at least once most games and my team always honours each other, and i never afk/dodge lobbies. I Don't see what's wrong. I've gotten about 10+ key fragments for sportsmenlike conduct since the honour system came out and now I'm wondering if my account is bugged?

My friend got honour level 3 and he played almost 3 weeks after the honor system came out and I've been playing since it came out.
Am I just salty/overthinking this or do i just need to play 100x more games a day?..

Pls help{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
There are a few different things that might be happening here. You mentioned that your team always honors each other, which *kind* of makes it sound like you're in a premade? AFAIK, getting honored by a premade team member will give you *a little bit less honor* than if a random teammate honored you. That could be the reason why you're progressing slower.

I did go ahead and check your account for any possible honor issues, and it looks like you are still getting exp.
I solo que most of the time, but thanks for replying. If im still getting exp then i was just overthinking it! :)) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
